description: Provides LaTeX compilation, preview, and language features
latex.build.title: Build LaTeX
latex.preview.title: Preview LaTeX
latex.clean.title: Clean LaTeX
latex.sync.title: SyncTeX: Sync from source
latex.gotoMatchingPair.title: Go to Matching \begin/\end
latex.selectEnvContent.title: Select Environment Content
latex.selectEnvWhole.title: Select Entire Environment
latex.closeEnv.title: Close Current Environment
latex.selectEnvName.title: Select Environment Name
latex.multiCursorEnvName.title: Multi-cursor at Environment Names
latex.compilation.mode.auto: Try WASM first, fallback to server
latex.outline.sections.description: Section names in LaTeX outline hierarchy. Use '|' to separate multiple tags at the same level, e.g., 'section|alternative'.
latex.outline.commands.description: Command names to show in outline/structure views. Commands must be called in the form \commandname{arg}.
latex.outline.floats.enabled.description: Show floating objects (figures and tables) in outline/structure views
latex.outline.floats.caption.enabled.des: Show captions for floating objects in outline
latex.outline.floats.number.enabled.desc: Show numbers for floating objects in outline
latex.texDirs.description: Additional directories to search for LaTeX files
latex.watch.files.ignore.description: Files to ignore from watching mechanism
latex.hover.preview.enabled.description: Enable hover preview for math equations and formulas
latex.hover.preview.scale.description: Scale factor for the rendered equation preview (1 = 100%)
latex.hover.preview.cursor.enabled.descr: Show cursor position indicator in the equation preview
latex.hover.preview.cursor.symbol.descri: Symbol used to indicate cursor position in equation preview
latex.hover.preview.cursor.color.descrip: Color of the cursor indicator in equation preview. Use 'auto' to match the editor theme
latex.hover.preview.mathjax.extensions.d: Additional MathJax extensions to load for equation rendering
latex.hover.ref.enabled.description: Enable hover preview for references (\ref, \eqref, etc.)
latex.hover.ref.preview.enabled.descript: Show rendered equation preview for math references
latex.hover.graphics.maxHeight.descripti: Maximum height in pixels for image preview in hover
latex.checkDuplicateLabels.title: Check for Duplicate Labels
latex.promoteSection.title: Promote Section Level
latex.demoteSection.title: Demote Section Level
latex.selectSection.title: Select Current Section
latex.fixQuotes.title: Fix Typographic Quotes
latex.check.duplicatedLabels.enabled.des: Enable automatic detection of duplicate labels in LaTeX documents
latex.check.citations.automatic.descript: Enable automatic citation checking when editing LaTeX or BibTeX files
latex.wrapEnvironment.title: Wrap Selection with Environment
latex.surroundWithCommand.title: Surround Selection with Command
latex.toggleEquationEnv.title: Toggle Equation Environment
latex.shortcut.textbf.title: Toggle Bold (\textbf)
latex.shortcut.textit.title: Toggle Italic (\textit)
latex.shortcut.underline.title: Toggle Underline (\underline)
latex.shortcut.emph.title: Toggle Emphasis (\emph)
latex.shortcut.mathbf.title: Toggle Math Bold (\mathbf)
latex.shortcut.mathit.title: Toggle Math Italic (\mathit)
latex.shortcut.mathbb.title: Toggle Math Blackboard (\mathbb)
latex.shortcut.mathcal.title: Toggle Math Calligraphic (\mathcal)
latex.wordCount.title: Count Words
latex.onEnterKey.title: Smart Enter (auto \item)
latex.bibSort.title: Sort BibTeX File
latex.bibAlign.title: Align BibTeX File
latex.bibSortAlign.title: Sort and Align BibTeX File
latex.wordCount.showInStatusBar.descript: Show word count in the status bar
latex.smartEnter.enabled.description: Enable smart Enter key (auto \item in lists)
latex.bibtex.format.tab.description: Indentation for BibTeX entries (e.g., '  ' for 2 spaces, '\t' for tab)
latex.bibtex.format.alignOnEqual.descrip: Align field values on the equal sign
latex.bibtex.format.sortFields.descripti: Sort fields within each BibTeX entry
latex.bibtex.format.sortBy.description: Keys to sort BibTeX entries by (e.g., ['key'], ['year-desc', 'author'])
latex.bibtex.format.trailingComma.descri: Add trailing comma after the last field
latex.format.alignTableColumns.descripti: Align columns in tabular and matrix environments
latex.format.wrapLongLines.description: Wrap lines that exceed the line width
latex.format.lineWidth.description: Maximum line width for wrapping (when enabled)
latex.format.insertFinalNewline.descript: Ensure file ends with a newline
latex.format.alignEquationEnvironments.d: Align equation environments at the & character
latex.checkCitations.title: Check Citations
latex.showUnusedCitations.title: Show Unused BibTeX Entries
